response.overview: "Heroes, famous songs, signs, and wonders weave the unforgettable story of faith and courage about the greatness of ancient Egypt in this brilliantly illustrated tale! It is the story of Moses, who was drawn from the Nile River by the daughter of the terrible ruler - Pharaoh. Moses grew up as the favored companion of Ramses II, the son of Pharaoh. He witnesses the cruel treatment of the Egyptian rulers towards the Hebrews and discovers his true calling: to lead his people - Israel - from bondage to freedom. With complete faith in his God, Moses defeats the new Ramses and leads his people out of Egypt on a long and arduous journey accompanied by miracles and wonders. The illustrated story of the Exodus is an adventure that the whole family will want to watch again and again."
response.title: Moses- The Prince of Egypt
